description: Tech activists, artists, and creators who helped organize Google, Facebook, WeWork, Kickstarter, and more annotated an assemblage of common anti-union statements.  The zine's organizer-driven content is an inoculation tool for tech workers that exposes them to union busting rhetoric and arms them with pro union rebuttals.
author: clarissa
addresses: Google One Market, 1, Market Street, Financial District, San Francisco, San Francisco City and County, San Francisco, California, 94111, United States
